Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Djedher, a priest with a blue painted lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed arms in relief holding a blue painted adze and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with blue painted Hieroglyphs(worn); there is a back-pillar and the remains of a plinth beneath the damaged foot.
Condition: incomplete - foot damaged and glaze worn
